description: This chicken recipe brings the heat but is tempered by the sweetness of the dressing.
name: Peri Peri Chicken with Mango, Avocado & Lime Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium chicken fillets, butterfly cut open
2 small red / green chilli, finely chopped
1 small red onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the butterflied chicken with the olive oil and peri peri seasoning and allow to marinate for 2 hours in the fridge. Combine the chopped mango, chilli, lime juice, sesame oil and red onion in a bowl and set to one side.
Chargrill the marinated chicken breasts on a medium heat for 6 minutes on each side or until cooked though. Remove from the heat and serve with the mango dressing and garnish with slices of avocado.
